sentences.english: They’re stirring up fights over a woman’s right to make her own health care choices.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲婦女健康選擇權益保護而攪和。

sentences.english: You ought to get theirs lefts or interest into a contract.
sentences.chinese: 你們必需把她們的權益訂在合同中。

sentences.english: The State protects the lawful rights and interests of schools and other institutions of education from infringement.
sentences.chinese: 國家保護學校及其他教育機構的合法權益不受侵犯。

sentences.english: Why reforming Canada’s unpopular laws on indigenous rights is so hard
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要改革加拿大原住民權益的陋法如此困難？

sentences.english: A wife would have an insurable interest in her husband's life.
sentences.chinese: 妻子在她丈夫的生活裏有可保權益。

sentences.english: A higher level of equity, of course, makes it easier to issue debt.
sentences.chinese: 當然，權益水平的上升會使發債變得相對容易。

sentences.english: Development and equipment of navy armament is significant way to maintain the ocean rights and interests.
sentences.chinese: 海洋權益的維護主要依靠海上軍事力量的建設。

sentences.english: Impartially enforcing the law and effectively safeguarding the legitimate rights and interests of taxpayers.
sentences.chinese: 秉公執法，切實維護納稅人的合法權益。

sentences.english: The title of Chapter IV shall be amended as "Rights and Interests of Labor and Social Security".
sentences.chinese: 第四章章名修改爲“勞動和社會保障權益”。

sentences.english: Counterfeit goods infringe customers' legal rights.
sentences.chinese: 僞劣商品侵越了消費者的合法權益。

sentences.english: Han clothing will use the patent system in the future, protect their legitimate rights and interests.
sentences.chinese: 今後漢派服裝將運用專利制度，保護自己的合法權益。

sentences.english: Nine bead application of my vexatious rights to provoke nan peja trouble.
sentences.chinese: 九珠應用本人的無理取鬧權益惹楠佩費事。

sentences.english: The next section to the right contains the AUX RETURNS.
sentences.chinese: 下一節包括的權益的AUX退貨。

sentences.english: Sovereign risk must be accounted for as part of cost of equity.
sentences.chinese: 主權風險必須作爲權益成本的一部分加以考慮。

sentences.english: Safeguarding the new international marine order and the state's marine rights and interests.
sentences.chinese: 維護國際海洋新秩序和國家海洋權益。

sentences.english: The Low-Temp Food Group will be dedicated to creating the best long-term value for our stockholders.
sentences.chinese: 低溫羣將不斷致力於創造股東最高的長期權益。

definition: right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
